articles.title: Google is speeding up Chrome’s release cycle to every four weeks - The Verge
articles.description: Google is planning to speed up Chrome releases later this year. Chrome will move to a four week schedule, instead of six weeks. A new Extended Stable channel will also be available for IT admins.
